stereo.tools.FindMarker¶

class stereo.tools.FindMarker(data, cluster, test_groups='all', control_groups='rest', method='t-test', corr_method=None, name=None)¶

a tool for finding maker gene define a cluster as group, find statistical test different genes between one group and the others using t-test or wilcoxon_test

__init__(data, cluster, test_groups='all', control_groups='rest', method='t-test', corr_method=None, name=None)¶

initialization

Parameters

  • data – anndata

  • cluster – the ‘Clustering’ tool name, defined when running ‘Clustering’ tool

  • test_groups – default all clusters

  • control_groups – rest of groups

  • method – t-test or wilcoxon_test

  • corr_method – correlation method

  • name – name of this tool and will be used as a key when adding tool result to andata object.
